description: First up, John Brownstein, an Associate Professor of Pediatrics at Boston Children’s Hospital and the co-founder of HealthMap, talks about using digital tools to track the Ebola outbreak. Then, Lindsey Turrentine, Editor-in-Chief of Reviews at CNET, joins us to discuss wearable technology for infants.
title: Marketplace Tech for Tuesday, August 12, 2014
teaser: First up, John Brownstein, an Associate Professor of Pediatrics at Boston Children’s Hospital and the co-founder of HealthMap, talks about using digital tools to track the Ebola outbreak. Then, Lindsey Turrentine, Editor-in-Chief of Reviews at CNET, joins us to discuss wearable technology for infants.
